data.comment: Today's referee, Felix Brych, has blown to start the match.
Bremen are whistled for offside.
In the minute 3, Corner awarded to Bremen.
Free kick for Bremen in the half of Frankfurt.
At Commerzbank Arena, Stefan Ilsanker has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 7, Frankfurt have been awarded a corner by Felix Brych.
Can Frankfurt capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bremen's half?
Ball safe as Bremen is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 9, Free kick Frankfurt.
Frankfurt's Bas Dost attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Felix Brych awards Bremen a goal kick.
In the minute 11, Felix Brych signals a free kick to Bremen.
Free kick for Frankfurt in their own half.
Frankfurt drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 13, Bremen's Jean-Manuel Mbom breaks free at Commerzbank Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Frankfurt.
Ball goes out of play for a Bremen goal kick.
In the minute 15, Goal kick for Bremen at Commerzbank Arena.
Felix Brych awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Bremen at Commerzbank Arena.
In the minute 18, Bremen awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bremen are caught offside.
Throw-in Bremen.
In the minute 22, Tahith Chong for Bremen gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Frankfurt have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Bremen in their own half.
In the minute 26, Frankfurt awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Frankfurt get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bremen's half?
Ball safe as Bremen is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 33, Corner awarded to Frankfurt.
In Frankfurt a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Frankfurt's Daichi Kamada is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 36, Steven Zuber for the home team is judged to be offside.
Felix Brych signals a free kick to Bremen in their own half.
In Frankfurt Frankfurt drive forward through Andre Silva. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 38, Felix Brych awards the away team a throw-in.
Felix Brych signals a Bremen throw-in in Frankfurt's half.
Throw-in for Frankfurt in their own half.
In the minute 41, In Frankfurt a free kick has been awarded the home team.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Frankfurt.
Frankfurt's Steven Zuber gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 43, Bremen have a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Frankfurt in Frankfurt.
Frankfurt have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 45, Bremen needs to be cautious. Frankfurt have an attacking throw-in.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick in a good position for Frankfurt!
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 45, Jean-Manuel Mbom for Bremen has been booked by Felix Brych and receives a first yellow card.
The second half has started at Commerzbank Arena.
Free kick Frankfurt.
Throw-in for Frankfurt in the half of Bremen.
In the minute 46, The home team have replaced Stefan Ilsanker with Dominik Kohr. This is the first substitution made today by Adi Hutter.
In the minute 47, Bremen awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Frankfurt.
Andre Silva (Frankfurt) strikes at Commerzbank Arena but his header is cleared.
In the minute 50, Bremen awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Frankfurt in their own half.
Goal! Josh Sargent gives Bremen a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 52, Bremen's Josh Sargent is whistled for offside at Commerzbank Arena.
Frankfurt are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Frankfurt have been awarded a corner by Felix Brych.
In the minute 55, Josh Sargent (Bremen) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Bremen have been awarded a corner by Felix Brych.
Corner awarded to Bremen.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Frankfurt close to the penalty box.
Adi Hutter (Frankfurt) is making a third substitution, with Amin Younes replacing Almamy Toure.
Aymen Barkok is replacing Steven Zuber for Frankfurt at Commerzbank Arena.
In the minute 61, In Frankfurt Frankfurt attack through David Abraham. The finish is off target, however.
Felix Brych awards Bremen a goal kick.
In the minute 62, Bremen awarded a free kick in their own half.
Milot Rashica is replacing Tahith Chong for the away team.
Goal kick for Frankfurt at Commerzbank Arena.
Bremen to take a throw-in in Frankfurt territory.
In the minute 65, Throw-in for Frankfurt at Commerzbank Arena.
Andre Silva is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
Daichi Kamada with an assist there.
In the minute 68, Bas Dost for Frankfurt drives towards goal at Commerzbank Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Bremen make their second substitution with Omer Toprak replacing Jean-Manuel Mbom.
Florian Kohfeldt is making the team's third substitution at Commerzbank Arena with Yuya Osako replacing Leonardo Bittencourt.
In the minute 71, Bremen awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Bremen's Maximilian Eggestein gets in a shot on goal at Commerzbank Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Felix Brych signals a free kick to Frankfurt.
In the minute 74, Ball safe as Bremen is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Bremen's Maximilian Eggestein gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Frankfurt goal kick.
In the minute 76, Andre Silva of Frankfurt gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Frankfurt.
Throw-in for Frankfurt in their own half.
In the minute 77, Felix Brych signals a throw-in for Frankfurt, close to Bremen's area.
Andre Silva's header is off-target for Frankfurt.
Bremen have a goal kick.
In the minute 79, Felix Brych signals a free kick to Bremen in their own half.
Free kick for Frankfurt in their own half.
Corner awarded to Frankfurt.
In the minute 82, Free kick for Bremen in their own half.
Florian Kohfeldt is making the team's fourth substitution at Commerzbank Arena with Kevin Mohwald replacing Christian Gross.
In Frankfurt Bremen drive forward through Milot Rashica. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 86, Felix Brych signals a free kick to Bremen in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Felix Brych awards Frankfurt a goal kick.
In the minute 87, Frankfurt have been awarded a corner by Felix Brych.
Frankfurt drives forward and David Abraham gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In Frankfurt, Bremen push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 89, Goal kick for Bremen at Commerzbank Arena.
Free kick for Frankfurt in the half of Bremen.
Ball goes out of play for a Bremen goal kick.
At Commerzbank Arena the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Bremen needs to be cautious. Frankfurt have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Bremen at Commerzbank Arena.
Felix Brych awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Frankfurt.
Frankfurt are whistled for offside.
It's 1-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Yuya Osako (Bremen) gets a yellow card.
